author: hack3rcon
content: Hello all,What is your opinion about the Telegram coin (Toncoin)? Does it have a bright future?Any idea welcome.Thank you.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Judging by how actively TON began to develop and how many different services arise in this network, its future could be very good. 2022 was a very bad year for the whole crypto industry, but TON itself showed good results for its investors in the second half of the year. You could say that TON was a kind of safe haven for crypto investors, just like the TWT project, for example. I think investing in TON is a good decision. Not financial advice, DYOR.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: There's a lot of hype with this coin a few years ago and knowing that Telegram is the one of the most used social media platforms right now (aside from the fact that it's being used to scam investors), creating a coin that has been attach to Telegram will be a huge one.Currently being traded at $2.34, it's price is just almost x3 to it's starting price 2 years ago and with lots of apps and services that is under TON, I guess this will have a good future. I'm a big fan of staking coins as well, so I might buy and stake TON coins this year. I think knowing that it's attached to Telegram, it's a good coin to hold for short to mid term only (around 1-3 years maybe). DYOR still.

comments.author: wajik-tempe
comments.body: As far as i know Telegram abandoned its TON project due to legal challenges from the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) which claimed that the company's initial coin offering (ICO) violated US securities laws. The name is still have "telegram" but it's not actually under telegram control.So i think it's unclear for it's future value, but the volume is still good for profit trading, but for me not really worth it for long time investment

comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: I think this project is worth watching. Certainly, the decision that Telegram was forced to stop active development of TON slowed down the development of this project a bit, but there is still a huge, active community behind it. It is worth mentioning that there is currently a virtual hackathon organized by TON and DoraHacks with a prize pool of $180k. Participants are to create Web3 products based on TON, such as:▪️ Fi+ (DeFi, SocialFi, GameFi)▪️ Utility NFT▪️ Utility SBT (Soul Bound Token)▪️ DAO governance▪️ Web 2.5 (The Ultimate Challenge).The event ends on March 31, more information can be found here: https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/63a481aed16ae879abc15b1c/

It remains to answer the question: who has 3.4 billion coins?
